thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Gary Smith

author: Gary Smith
title: Gary Smith
text: We required access to reliable people who would be able to live in our house and care for our elderly cat whilst we were away for 3 weeks. Quite a tall order. However, through TrustedHousesitters, we received a number of suitable applicants and eventually settled on a couple who turned out to be perfect for the job. An added bonus was the fact that we were able to correspond directly with them after the initial introduction to finalize details.
